mapper.select: SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_TY, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_DC AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_CN, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_PATH_NM AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_COURS FROM COMTNQUSTNRTMPLAT WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #{qestnrTmplatId}
SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_PATH_NM AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_COURS FROM COMTNQUSTNRTMPLAT

SELECT A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, A.QESTNR_ID, A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID AS QESTNR_QESITM_ID, A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID, ( SELECT IEM_CN FROM COMTNQUSTNRIEM WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_IEM_ID = A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID ) IEM_CN, COUNT(A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID) QUSTNR_IEM_ID_CNT, ROUND((100/ (SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNQUSTNRRSPNSRESULT WHERE QUSTNR_QESITM_ID = A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID) ) * COUNT(A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID)) QUSTNR_PERCENT FROM COMTNQUSTNRRSPNSRESULT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.QESTNR_ID = #{qestnrId} AND A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #{qestnrTmplatId} AND A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID,A.QESTNR_ID, A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID, A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID

SELECT A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, A.QESTNR_ID, A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID AS QESTNR_QESITM_ID, A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID, A.ETC_ANSWER_CN, A.RESPOND_ANSWER_CN, A.RESPOND_NM FROM COMTNQUSTNRRSPNSRESULT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.QESTNR_ID = #{qestnrId} AND A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #{qestnrTmplatId} AND A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID IS NULL

SELECT EMPLYR_ID, USER_NM, PASSWORD, EMPL_NO, IHIDNUM, SEXDSTN_CODE, BRTHDY, FXNUM, HOUSE_ADRES, PASSWORD_HINT, PASSWORD_CNSR, HOUSE_END_TELNO, AREA_NO, DETAIL_ADRES, ZIP, OFFM_TELNO, MBTLNUM, EMAIL_ADRES, OFCPS_NM, HOUSE_MIDDLE_TELNO, GROUP_ID, ORGNZT_ID, PSTINST_CODE, EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE, ESNTL_ID FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE 1=1 AND ESNTL_ID = #{uniqId}

SELECT A.QESTNR_ID, A.QUSTNR_SJ AS QESTNR_SJ, A.QUSTNR_PURPS AS QESTNR_PURPS, A.QUSTNR_WRITNG_GUIDANCE_CN AS QESTNR_WRITNG_GUIDANCE_CN, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.QUSTNR_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') QESTNR_BEGIN_DE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.QUSTNR_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') QESTNR_END_DE, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.QUSTNR_TRGET AS QESTNR_TRGET, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID FROM COMTNQESTNRINFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.QESTNR_ID = #{qestnrId} AND A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #{qestnrTmplatId}

SELECT A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID AS QESTNR_QESITM_ID, A.QESTNR_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.QESTN_SN, A.QESTN_TY_CODE, A.QESTN_CN, A.MXMM_CHOISE_CO, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID FROM COMTNQUSTNRQESITM A WHERE 1=1 AND A.QESTNR_ID = #{qestnrId} AND A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #{qestnrTmplatId}

SELECT A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID AS QESTNR_QESITM_ID, A.QESTNR_ID, A.IEM_SN, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID, A.IEM_CN, A.ETC_ANSWER_AT, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID FROM COMTNQUSTNRIEM A WHERE 1=1 AND A.QESTNR_ID = #{qestnrId} AND A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #{qestnrTmplatId}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNQESTNRINFO A JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON B.ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND QUSTNR_SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND B.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_TY FROM COMTNQUSTNRRSPNSRESULT
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNQUSTNRRSPNSRESULT SET QUSTNR_IEM_ID=#{qustnrIemId}, RESPOND_ANSWER_CN=#{respondAnswerCn}, RESPOND_NM=#{respondNm}, ETC_ANSWER_CN=#{etcAnswerCn}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_RSPNS_RESULT_ID = #{qestnrQesrspnsId}
mapper.select: SELECT QUSTNR_RSPNS_RESULT_ID AS QESTNR_QESRSPNS_ID, ( SELECT QUSTNR_SJ FROM COMTNQESTNRINFO WHERE 1=1 AND QESTNR_ID = A.QESTNR_ID ) QESTNR_SJ, ( SELECT QESTN_TY_CODE FROM COMTNQUSTNRQESITM WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_QESITM_ID = A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID ) QESTN_TY_CODE, ( SELECT QESTN_CN FROM COMTNQUSTNRQESITM WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_QESITM_ID = A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID ) QESTN_CN, ( SELECT IEM_CN FROM COMTNQUSTNRIEM WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_IEM_ID = A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID ) IEM_CN, A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID, A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID AS QESTNR_QESITM_ID, A.QESTNR_ID, A.RESPOND_ANSWER_CN, A.RESPOND_NM, A.ETC_ANSWER_CN, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNQUSTNRRSPNSRESULT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.QUSTNR_RSPNS_RESULT_ID = #{qestnrQesrspnsId}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNQUSTNRRSPNSRESULT WHERE 1=1
AND ETC_ANSWER_CN LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND RESPOND_ANSWER_CN LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND RESPOND_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNQUSTNRRSPNSRESULT ( QUSTNR_RSPNS_RESULT_ID, QUSTNR_QESITM_ID, QESTNR_ID, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID, QUSTNR_IEM_ID, RESPOND_ANSWER_CN, RESPOND_NM, ETC_ANSWER_CN, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{qestnrQesrspnsId}, #{qestnrQesitmId}, #{qestnrId}, #{qestnrTmplatId}, #{qustnrIemId}, #{respondAnswerCn}, #{respondNm}, #{etcAnswerCn}, SYSDATETIME, #{frstRegisterId}, SYSDATETIME, #{lastUpdusrId} )
